text: Arad (pronunciation in Romanian: ; Hungarian: Arad; Serbian: Арад, Arad) is the capital city of Arad County, in the western part of Romania, in Crişana, Ardeal. It is found on the Mureş River. == Twinnings == === Sister cities === * Atlit, Israel * Fushun, China * Gyula, Hungary * Hódmezővásárhely, Hungary * Giv'atayim, Israel * Pécs, Hungary === Partner cities === * Kirklees, United Kingdom * Ditzingen, Germany * Würzburg, Germany * Trencin, Slovakia * Tatabánya, Hungary * Zrenjanin, Serbia ==References== Category:County capitals of Romania Category:Municipalities of Romania Category:Cities in Romania Category:Arad County
title: Arad, Romania
